title: HIGHLIGHTS-Golf-U.S. Masters Day Two
text:
April 6, 2018 / 3:23 PM / Updated 2 hours ago HIGHLIGHTS-Golf-U.S. Masters Day Two Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
AUGUSTA, Georgia, April 6 (Reuters) - Highlights from the second round of the 82nd U.S. Masters on Friday: 
SPIETH OPENS ROUND WITH DOUBLE-BOGEY 
Overnight leader and world number four Jordan Spieth made a double-bogey on the opening hole at Augusta National to drop into a tie for the lead with fellow American Matt Kuchar. READ MORE 
Courageous Finau a Masters feel-good story 
2016 collapse keeps Spieth grounded at Augusta 
Tiger proud to salvage round in Masters return 
I hit good shots, says Garcia after ugly 13 
In the drink! Day sends shot into beer cup 
O’Meara likely playing final Masters 
Augusta National to host women’s tournament 
The two homes Augusta National can’t buy 
Augusta’s 15th offers high risk, high reward (Reporting by Frank Pingue; Editing by Ed Osmond and Christian Radnedge)
